perks.name: Moving Target
perks.desc: Each Melee Attack you land reduces the Ranged Damage you take by 5% (up to 30%). If you do not land a Melee Attack for 5 seconds, the effect ends.

perks.name: Melee Mastery
perks.desc: Melee Damage increases by 10% against Majoris-level and higher enemies.

perks.name: Upper Hand
perks.desc: After a perfectly timed Parry, Block or Dodge, you do not lose control upon taking Heavy Hits and you cannot be knocked back for 10 seconds.

perks.name: Duellist
perks.desc: Perfect Parry and Perfect Block windows increase by 50%.

perks.name: Close-Combat Focus
perks.desc: You take 20% less Ranged Damage.

perks.name: Conviction
perks.desc: When your Armour is fully Depleted, you take 25% less Health Damage for 10 seconds.

perks.name: Retribution
perks.desc: After you are grabbed or knocked back, you deal 30% more Melee Damage for 20 seconds.

perks.name: Consecutive Execution
perks.desc: Killing 7 enemies within 5 seconds restores Equipment Charge by 1. Cooldown is 90 seconds.

perks.name: Honed Reactions
perks.desc: When your Health is less than 50%, your Perfect Dodge window is doubled.

perks.name: Melee Champion
perks.desc: All Squad Members deal 15% more Melee Damage.

perks.name: Unmatched Zeal
perks.desc: Melee Finishers of Extremis- or Terminus-level additionally restore Health by 30% for any Squad Member.

perks.name: Inner Fire
perks.desc: All Squad Members can restore Ability Charge by 15% by performing Finishers on Majoris-level or higher enemies.

perks.name: Restless Fortitude
perks.desc: After a Diving Kick, you take 40% less Ranged Damage for 10 seconds.

perks.name: Shock Wave
perks.desc: Diving Kick additionally deals 50% of its main Damage in a 5-metre radius.

perks.name: Collateral Damage
perks.desc: Diving Kick deals 10% more Damage and additionally deals damage that scales with difficulty to enemies on the way to the Grapnel Launcher's target.

perks.name: Zone of Impact
perks.desc: Performing a Finisher with the Grapnel Launcher deals Damage that scales with difficulty to enemies within 5-metres.

perks.name: Tenacity
perks.desc: After killing 10 enemies within 5 seconds, Diving Kick's Damage increases by 40% for 15 seconds.

perks.name: Tip of the Spear
perks.desc: Enemies hit by Diving Kick take 15% more Ranged Damage for 10 seconds.

perks.name: Thrill of the Fight
perks.desc: After a perfectly timed Parry, Block or Dodge, you take 20% less Health Damage for 5 seconds.

perks.name: Grim Determination
perks.desc: When Grapnel Launcher is in cooldown, Weapon Damage increases by 15%.

perks.name: Combat Readiness
perks.desc: Grapnel Launcher recharges 20% faster.

perks.name: Tactical Prowess
perks.desc: Grapnel Launcher can activate a Finisher not only on Incapacitated enemies but also on those who have less than 33% (except Terminus level), and Performing a Finisher with the Grapnel Launcher fully restores its Ability Charge.

perks.name: Emperor's Blessing
perks.desc: Take Lethal Damage restores all Armour instead of Incapacitating you. Cooldown is 120 seconds.

perks.name: Adrenaline Rush
perks.desc: Melee kills of Majoris-level or higher enemies restore Health by 5%.

prestige.name: I
prestige.desc: Battlefield Awareness - If a target is within 8 meters, you deal 10% more Ranged Damage.

prestige.name: II
prestige.desc: Exigency Charge - When your Health is less than 25%, Ability Charge regenerates 15% faster.

prestige.name: III
prestige.desc: Indomitable Spirit - While performing a Gun Strike, you do not lose control upon taking Heavy Hits, and you cannot be knocked back.

prestige.name: V
prestige.desc: Launch Restoration - Using the Grapnel Launcher restores 1 Armour Segment.

prestige.name: VI
prestige.desc: Restoration - Killing 7 enemies in rapid succession restores 1 Armour Segment. Cooldown is 15 seconds.

prestige.name: VII
prestige.desc: Well Equipped - Equipment Damage increases by 20%.
